definition: square/power or involution (math.)/upright/honest/fair and square/direction/side/party (to a contract, dispute etc)/place/method/prescription (medicine)/just when/only or just/classifier for square things/abbr. for square or cubic meter

sentences.english: Collapse treatment in section of Hongye-2 Hydroelectric Power Station headrace tunnel downstream of adit No.
sentences.chinese: 红叶二级水电站引水隧洞2号支洞下游塌方段处理。

sentences.english: A group of young people butterfly valley, play a cave-in events, one man die.
sentences.chinese: 一群年轻人们蝶幽谷玩，一次塌方事件，一个人死了。

sentences.english: The typhoon, referred to locally as Milenyo, caused floods and landslides that have displaced some 5,500 people.
sentences.chinese: 台风造成的水灾和塌方使大约5500人无家可归。

sentences.english: The stone cage , made of geonet , can prevent collapsing when being used in dike.
sentences.chinese: 用土工网制作石笼，应用于堤坝可以防止塌方。

sentences.english: The sinkhole was caused by rains and an underground sewageflow.
sentences.chinese: 这个塌方的污水池是由于雨水和地下污水流动造成的。

sentences.english: Chen said no casualties had been reported, but some houses collapsed and landslides occurred.
sentences.chinese: 陈卫铭说并伤亡报告，房屋倒塌，山体也有塌方。

sentences.english: Many coal-miners were imprisoned in a pit accident.
sentences.chinese: 在一次塌方事故中，很多矿工被压在了井下。

sentences.english: They've been there now two days since the cave-in.
sentences.chinese: 他们自从矿山塌方以来已经在那2天了。

sentences.english: They immediately undertook the heart-stirring battle to prevent the landslide.
sentences.chinese: 他们立即展开了一场惊心动魄的防止塌方的战斗。

sentences.english: The sinkhole was caused by rains and an underground sewage flow.
sentences.chinese: 这个塌方是大雨与下水道塌陷造成的。

sentences.english: In this way the lose landslide pile can concert into a whole and can be dug into tunnel.
sentences.chinese: 使松散塌方堆积体固成一个整体，直接进行开挖成洞。

sentences.english: He is also the only one of the survivors rescued in good physical condition from Leigu town…
sentences.chinese: 他也是擂鼓镇在塌方中救出唯一身体完好的幸存者。

sentences.english: The roof or walls will not cave in.
The initial program of the top box culvert could easily lead to landslides due to be denied.
sentences.chinese: 最初的顶箱涵方案因易造成塌方被否定。

sentences.english: Roof fall can not be completely avoided in construction of hydraulic tunnels.
sentences.chinese: 冒顶塌方在水工隧洞施工过程中难以完全避免。

sentences.english: Humongous sinkholes and landslides have developed along this line.
sentences.chinese: 伟大灰岩坑和塌方已沿着这条路线陆续出现。

definition: to collapse (of building, dam or bridge)
to rush through urgently (e.g. emergency supplies)
to dig out/to excavate/to scoop out
